Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am expert in human geography and game development. I am going to ask a series of game-design questions to design a simulation game based around human geography where AI populations can grow and change based on my knowledge of human geography.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Using the questions and answers above design a simulation game where AI factions and their populations can realistically grow and change based on human geography. Describe the mechanics in detail, how they interact with one another, and how human geography comes into play.
